Hi! My name is Kim.


I'm a software engineer who is passionate about web and mobile development.

I'm an avid learner with experience in client-side and server-side web development using AngularJS, Django, Flask, and Jekyll.

When I'm not coding, I'm either wandering around the city, cooking or just working on side projects.

I'm currently learning react-native and just submitted my app first iOS app, Where Is My Bus?, to the app store!

Projects

Where Is My Bus?

An iOS app to find the nearest mta bus stop, get the bus that stops at thet stop and each of the time of the next coming bus. Where Is My Bus? is built with swift and using the MTA Bus API.

Django Hackathon Starter

A Django boilerplate with API examples and several OAuth integrations, includes an Ionic application for both mobile and web applications.

Pascal Compiler

Pascal compiler written in python. Supports loops, jumps, declarations, basic arithmetics, and more.

Fire Emblem

A Fire Emblem clone, a turned-based strategy role playing game built with ImpactJS.

Super Mario: Koopa Krisis

Super Mario World clone, a 2D platformer game, built with ImpactJS.
